title: Bikewatching
description: This project visualizes Bostonâ€™s Bluebikes traffic using an interactive Mapbox map and D3.js. Each station is represented by a circle whose size reflects total traffic volume and whose color shows the balance between departures and arrivals throughout the day.

title: Harmful Algal Blooms Forecasting
description: Completed as part of IEEE-Eta Kappa-Nu's projects program. This project aims to forecast harmful algal blooms using a zeroshot foundational model based on the T5 architecture.

title: The Price of Health
description: Completed for DSC106. This project effectively visualizes the difference in food processing levels and price between grocery stores.

title: Dance Battle AI
description: Completed for the Data Science Student Society Hackathon (DataHacks). This project is a real-time multiplayer, full-stack web app where two players dance along to the same reference choreography and the one who matches it best wins!

title: Portfolio
description: Completed for DSC106. This project is a personal web site that was made utilizing JS, HTML, and CSS.

title: Sea-Level Anomaly Detection
description: Completed for the National Science Foundation Harnessing the Data Revolution Machine Learning Challenge Hackathon. This project uses a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to detect sea-level anomaly events from satellite heat maps across 12 coastal cities.

title: Cooking Up Insights - Analyzing Recipe Ratings and Preparation Times
description: Completed for DSC80. This project uses a Scikit-learn pipeline for linear regression, enhancing predictive modeling of cooking times based on recipe features like description length and seasonal trends.

title: Image Processing App: Implementing Classes, Inheritance, and a KNN Classifier
description: Completed for DSC30. This project is a Python-based image processing application focusing on object-oriented programming principles and includes a function for various image transformations and a KNN classifer to predict image labels.

title: Meteorite Hypothesis Testing
description: Completed for DSC10. This project visualizes meteorite data and performs hypothesis testing.

title: Data Analysis of Taylor Swift's Discography
description: Completed for DSC10. This Python-based data analysis project focuses on exploring lyrical and audio features of Taylor Swift's songs performing exploratory data analysis to uncover trends.

title: Movie Recommender
description: This project builds a personalized movie recommender system using collaborative filtering to suggest films based on user preferences and viewing history.

title: Spam Email Classifier
description: This project trains a Naive Bayes model to classify spam emails based on message content and metadata.

title: House Price Predictor
description: This project predicts house prices using multiple regression on real estate features like size, location, and condition.
